name: Tamagotchi no Pichi Pichi Omisetchi
description:
'Tamagotchi no Pichi Pichi Omisetchi' (otherwise known as たまごっちのピチピチおみせっち) is a Tamagotchi game developed by NanaOn-Sha for the Nintendo DS. It was released only in Japan on June 17th, 2010. It is the seventh Tamagotchi entry to be made for the DS, and is also the first out of its kind to invest in third-dimensional (3D) graphics. It is the quintuple sequel to 'Tamagotchi Connection: Corner Shop 4'.

Reunite with the beloved trio Mametchi, Memetchi and Kuchipatchi, but this time with a new face on the team: Lovelitchi, a fashion-loving Tamagotchi! With a stroke of luck, your party has won the lottery to cruise Pichi Pichi Island, a sedate resort known for its numerous attractions. However, the local businesses there have began to crumble...

By virtue of sympathy to see this island flourish like it once did, you've all banded together to aid the residents with their goal to revive this pent-up paradise. Rake in the dough, count your bucks, and keep on your toes with over 10 brand new shops to volunteer at! Focus your team efforts on upgrading them to their maximum potential, collecting all possible souvenirs, and socializing with the residents of this island. It's go-go time!
